医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
气候变化导致全球火灾相关死亡率急剧上升气候变化导致全球与火灾相关的死亡人数急剧上升，由于火灾引起的 PM2.5 排放量增加，死亡率从 20 世纪 60 年代到 2010 年代增加了一倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Climate-change-drives-sharp-rise-in-fire-lated-mortality-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Climate-change-drives-sharp-rise-in-fire-lated-mortality-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34a8f859-63d9-4dfa-9ead-c09488291281 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Climate change drives sharp rise in fire-related mortality worldwide
可穿戴传感器和机器学习可以预测工人的疲劳程度，以提高安全性和生产力研究人员使用多模式可穿戴传感器和机器学习来跟踪制造工人的实时疲劳情况，揭示对个人疲劳模式和潜在的人体工程学改进的重要见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Wearable-sensors-and-machine-learning-predict-worker-fatigue-to-improve-safety-and-productivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Wearable-sensors-and-machine-learning-predict-worker-fatigue-to-improve-safety-and-productivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09bdfb77-04c2-41ab-a95e-fd6f75c84935 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Wearable sensors and machine learning predict worker fatigue to improve safety and productivity
乌克兰研究人员开发了用于检测儿童自闭症和发育迟缓的数字工具乌克兰研究人员开发了一种新的数字工具，用于检测儿童自闭症和发育迟缓。她的研究发表在剑桥大学出版社期刊《剑桥棱镜：全球心理健康》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ukrainian-researcher-develops-digital-tool-for-detecting-autism-and-developmental-delay-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ukrainian-researcher-develops-digital-tool-for-detecting-autism-and-developmental-delay-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cc77162-8225-4148-856e-0663af250968 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 23:01:01 -0400 Ukrainian researcher develops digital tool for detecting autism and developmental delay in kids
抗体药物偶联物的进步改变了癌症治疗抗体药物偶联物 (ADC) 已成为癌症治疗中一种有前途的方法，提供了一种将单克隆抗体的精确性与细胞毒性药物的效力结合在一起的“灵丹妙药”策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Advancements-in-antibody-drug-conjugates-transform-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Advancements-in-antibody-drug-conjugates-transform-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a017852d-f146-4437-842d-aae010714c19 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Advancements in antibody-drug conjugates transform cancer therapy
UK-DTOP 工具有望改善肾移植受者的预后由国际肾脏医生开发的一种新的先进人工智能（AI）工具代表着在预测和潜在改善英国肾移植患者的结果方面向前迈出了重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/UK-DTOP-tool-promises-improved-outcomes-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/UK-DTOP-tool-promises-improved-outcomes-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e27b4e0-37fa-497f-993f-b5c2c96256c3 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:54:09 -0400 UK-DTOP tool promises improved outcomes for kidney transplant recipients
坏血病可能会在经济紧张的情况下卷土重来医生在治疗一名中年男子后在《BMJ 病例报告》杂志上表示，随着生活成本危机和减肥（减肥）手术的增加，由维生素 C 缺乏引起的坏血病可能会重新出现。与条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9243d2dc-32b8-4198-b844-2a05f359affa Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:48:33 -0400 Scurvy may be making a comeback amid economic strain
研究表明精神分裂症与心源性猝死风险增加有关表明，在没有既往患有心脏病的情况下，精神分裂症患者因心血管原因意外死亡的终生风险（称为心源性猝死）比一般人群高 4 倍以上丹麦研究在线发表在《Heart》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9768b69-9d4f-4a30-aaa2-e50edfaa69e8 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:45:02 -0400 Study links schizophrenia to increased risk of sudden cardiac death
城市中丰富的绿化可能会降低与高温相关的死亡并改善福祉发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的一项对现有研究的系统综述发现，城市地区丰富的绿色空间与较低的与高温相关的疾病和死亡率以及更好的心理健康和福祉有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Abundant-greenery-in-cities-may-lower-heat-lated-deaths-and-improve-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Abundant-greenery-in-cities-may-lower-heat-lated-deaths-and-improve-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53ba93d1-c882-4373-940f-8750d4902fa7 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:40:21 -0400 Abundant greenery in cities may lower heat-related deaths and improve wellbeing
新药 WNTinib 有望治疗小儿肝癌一种名为 WNTinib 的新药可以延缓肿瘤的生长并提高肝母细胞瘤（一种发生在幼儿中的肝癌）的生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-WNTinib-shows-promise-in-treating-pediatric-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-WNTinib-shows-promise-in-treating-pediatric-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e50c2db-c7ce-4b9c-91f4-2cf3c3219b69 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:36:59 -0400 New drug WNTinib shows promise in treating pediatric liver cancer
医疗保险选择引发老年人的旋转门目前，全国各地数以千万计的老年人和严重残疾人面临着一个选择：是坚持当前的医疗保险选项，还是在公开参保期间进行改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Medicare-choices-spark-revolving-door-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Medicare-choices-spark-revolving-door-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d4c484e-d13f-47cb-ac19-d2941292e75f Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:32:11 -0400 Medicare choices spark revolving door for older adults
